buildCommand: curl -fsSL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.27.1-stable.tar.xz | tar -xJ && export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && git config --global --add safe.directory /vercel/path0/flutter && flutter config --no-analytics && flutter --version && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release
installCommand: echo 'Flutter will be installed during build'
